verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّحْمَ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ
verses.translation: О Милосердный (наш Господь)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَلَّمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13123'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْء<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Он - Тот, Кто научил Корану

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: خَلَقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7324'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5969'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Кто создал человека

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَلَّمَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13124'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَي<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Разумной речи научил его

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّمْسُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8956'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَمَرُ بِحُسْب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نٍ
verses.translation: Пути движения назначил Солнцу и Луне И фазы их (явления Земле) определил

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13125'>جْ</tajweed>مُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8958'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّجَرُ يَسْجُد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Склоняют головы пред Ним И Звезды (в небе), и Деревья (на земле)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13126'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمِيز<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Он водрузил высокий свод небес И (Волею Своей) Весы установил (Для замерения добра и зла)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَّا تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6515'>طْ</tajweed>غَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13127'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمِيز<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Чтоб вы не преступали должного баланса

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلْوَزْنَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا۟ ٱلْمِيزَانَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَقِيمُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13128'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوَزْنَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1800'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13129'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمِيز<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa aqīmul-wazna  bil-qisṭi wa lā tukhsirul-mīzān(a).
verses.translation: А потому вес устанавливайте справедливо, Не уменьшая (чаши) равновесья

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Он землю распростер для всякого живья

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِيهَا فَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِهَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13130'>ةٌ و</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13131'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َخْلُ ذَاتُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13132'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَكْم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: На ней (для вас взрастил все виды) фруктов и плоды на пальмах, Укрытые надежно в гроздья

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَبُّ ذُو <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13133'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَصْفِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13134'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّيْح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نُ
verses.translation: И злаки (для людей) С сухими стеблями для корма (их скоту), И ароматные растения (и травы)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: خَلَقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7324'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5969'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7229'>ن ص</tajweed>َلْصَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13135'>لٍ ك</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13136'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَخّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>رِ
verses.translation: Он создал человека из гончарной глины, (Сухой и) звонкой, (как фаянс)

verses.text_uthmani: وَخَلَقَ ٱلْجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَخَلَقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13137'>ٱ</tajweed>لْج<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13138'>ِن م</tajweed>َّارِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13139'>جٍ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4598'>ِن ن</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>رٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa khalaqal-jānna mim mārijim min nār(in).
verses.translation: И джиннов создал из огня, Свободного от дыма

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: رَبُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13140'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13141'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَغْرِبَ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>يْ</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Владыка двух Восходов и Закатов

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَرَجَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9669'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِي<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Он грань установил меж двух морей, готовых слиться

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13142'>خٌ ل</tajweed>َّا يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13143'>بْ</tajweed>غِي<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Поставив там барьер (незримый), Через который им не перейти

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13144'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>لُّؤْلُؤُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13145'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَرْج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نُ
verses.translation: И из обеих вод выходят жемчуг и кораллы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَـٰمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13146'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَوَارِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13147'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13148'>نش</tajweed>َـَٔـاتُ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':837'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَحْرِ كَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12143'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَعْلَ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Ему принадлежат и корабли, Плывущие, как горы, высоко над морем

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا ف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نٍ
verses.translation: Исчезнет все, что суще на земле

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13149'>بْ</tajweed>قَىٰ وَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':603'>جْ</tajweed>هُ رَبِّكَ ذُو <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13150'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13151'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِكْر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yabqā wajhu rabbika żul-jalāli wal-ikrām(i).
verses.translation: Навек останется лишь Божий лик - Благочестив, и щедр, и величен

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: يَسْـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِى شَأْنٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَسْــَٔلُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2074'>ن ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':609'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':177'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ‌ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِى شَأْنٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yas'aluhū man fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), kulla yaumin huwa fī sya'n(in).
verses.translation: Все в небесах и на земле К Нему взывает (о своей нужде), И каждый день, (и каждый час, и каждое мгновенье) Вершит Он новые дела

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13152'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ثَّقَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: О вы, два тяжких (мира джиннов и людей)! Мы скоро вас рассудим (полным счетом)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنْ أَقْطَارِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ

class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13157'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':177'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ فَ<tajweed data-tajweed=':13158'>نف</tajweed>ُذُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ‌ۚ</tajweed> لَا تَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13159'>نف</tajweed>ُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā ma'syaral-jinni wal-insi inistaṭa'tum an tanfużū min aqṭāris-samāwāti wal-arḍi fanfużū, lā tanfużūna illā bisulṭān(in).
verses.translation: Сонм джиннов и людей! Коль вы сумеете проникнуть За грани неба и земли, - идите! Но вы не сможете туда пройти Иначе, как с Господнего соизволенья

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13160'>ظٌ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4598'>ِن ن</tajweed>َّا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13161'>رٍ و</tajweed>َنُحَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13162'>سٌ ف</tajweed>َلَا تَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13163'>نت</tajweed>َصِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yursalu 'alaikumā syuwāẓum min nār(in), wa nuḥāsun falā tantaṣirān(i).
verses.translation: На вас Мы пламя жгучее пошлем И дым (густой для удушенья); И никакой защиты вам не ждать

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَٱلدِّهَانِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَإِذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13164'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13165'>نش</tajweed>َقَّتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13166'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13167'>ةً ك</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13168'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دِّه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa iżansyaqqatis-samā'u fa kānat wardatan kad-dihān(i).
verses.translation: Расколется небесный свод И примет алый цвет, Подобный цвету лепестков цветка иль (закосневшей кожи)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَيَوْمَئِ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':10538'>ذٍ ل</tajweed>َّا يُسْــَٔلُ عَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13169'>ن ذ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13170'>نۢب</tajweed>ِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> إِن<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13171'>سٌ و</tajweed>َلَا ج<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa yauma'iżil lā yus'alu 'an żambihī insuw wa lā jānn(un).
verses.translation: В тот День Ни джиннов, ни людей Об их грехе не спросят

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: يُعْرَفُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَـٰهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِى وَٱلْأَقْدَامِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يُعْرَفُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13172'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5255'>جْ</tajweed>رِمُونَ بِسِيمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13173'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>صِى وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13174'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13174'>قْ</tajweed>د<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yu'raful-mujrimūna bisīmāhum fa yu'khażu bin-nawāṣī wal-aqdām(i).
verses.translation: И грешники распознаны по знакам будут И будут схвачены за волосы чела и нОги

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11279'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13175'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5255'>جْ</tajweed>رِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Таким предстанет перед грешниками Ад, Который они ложью нарекали

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ ء<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yaṭūfūna bainahā wa baina ḥamīmin ān(in).
verses.translation: И там блуждать им средь воды кипящей и огня

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َت<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa liman khāfa maqāma rabbihī jannatān(i).
verses.translation: Для тех же, кто испытывает страх Пред Господом своим предстать (неверным), (Откроются) два Сада

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ذَوَات<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَفْن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نٍ
verses.translation: Украшенные ветвями (деревьев)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13176'>جْ</tajweed>رِي<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: И в каждом - два источника текут

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِيهِمَا مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':843'>ن ك</tajweed>ُلِّ فَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِهَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13177'>ةٍ ز</tajweed>َوْج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: И в них - два вида каждого плода

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مُتَّكِــِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13178'>شِۭ ب</tajweed>َط<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13179'>بْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13180'>قٍ‌ۚ و</tajweed>َجَنَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13181'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َتَيْنِ د<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Muttaki'īna 'alā furusyim baṭā'inuhā min istabraq(in), wa janal-jannataini  dān(in).
verses.translation: И нежиться они там будут на коврах, Подшитых дорогой парчою, И к ним склоняться будут фрукты двух Садов

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: فِيهِنَّ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِيهِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ قَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>صِر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11365'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّرْفِ لَمْ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13182'>طْ</tajweed>مِثْهُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13183'>نس</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13184'>ٌ ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8394'>بْ</tajweed>لَهُمْ وَلَا ج<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fīhinna qāṣirātuṭ-ṭarf(i), lam yaṭmiṡhunna insun qablahum wa lā jānn(un).
verses.translation: Там ждут их молодые девы, Потупившие скромно взоры, К которым никогда (до них) Ни джинн, ни человек не прикасался

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13185'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَاقُوتُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13145'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَرْج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نُ
verses.translation: Подобные рубинам и кораллам

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هَلْ جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13186'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِحْسَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِ إِلَّا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13187'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِحْسَ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ
verses.translation: И может ли другою быть награда, Чем воздаянье за добро добром

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13188'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِهِمَا جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َت<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: И кроме этих двух Садов, Еще есть два другие

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13189'>دْ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َت<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Темно-зеленые (по цвету)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَت<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: В них два источника, что льют обильно воду

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِيهِمَا فَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِهَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13190'>ةٌ و</tajweed>َنَخْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13191'>لٌ و</tajweed>َرُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fīhimā fākihatuw wa nakhluw wa rummān(un).
verses.translation: И в них плоды, и пальмы, и гранаты

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِيهِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ خَيْر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تٌ حِس<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نٌ
verses.translation: В них добрые, прекрасные (девицы)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: حُو<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13192'>رٌ م</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13193'>قْ</tajweed>صُور<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13194'>تٌ ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13195'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخِي<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: С потупленными черными глазами, Сокрытые в шатрах

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَمْ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13182'>طْ</tajweed>مِثْهُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13183'>نس</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13184'>ٌ ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8394'>بْ</tajweed>لَهُمْ وَلَا ج<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lam yaṭmiṡhunna insun qablahum wa lā jānn(un).
verses.translation: К которым никогда (до них) Ни человек, ни джинн не прикасался

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِىٍّ حِسَانٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مُتَّكِــِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13196'>رٍ و</tajweed>َعَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13197'>بْ</tajweed>قَرِىٍّ حِس<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نٍ
verses.translation: И нежась на лугах зеленых и коврах прекрасных

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبِأَىِّ ءَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Тогда какое же из благ Господних Вы ложью можете наречь

verses.text_uthmani: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِى ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَبَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رَكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13198'>ٱ</tajweed>سْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13199'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13151'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِكْر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Благословенно имя Бога твоего, Владыки щедрости, величия и славы
